Mod.name: SpicyTP:FFUI 1.2.2
Mod.description: A texturepack that gives gives Noita's UI a heavy, metallic aesthetic. Created for the Youtuber and Twitcher 'FuryForged'. Tip: If two texture packs replace the same sprite, the pack lowest in the mod list takes priority over that sprite. To function correctly with SpicyTP:Core, this mod must be placed AFTER it in the load order.
